title: Citi Paraguay Recognized by Euromoney for Private Banking and Wealth Management Services
tag-1: Citi Paraguay Recognized by Euromoney for Private Banking and Wealth Management Services
tag-3: Miami, FL – Euromoney named Citi Paraguay one of the region's best banks for private banking and wealth management services. According to the magazine's Global Private Banking and Wealth Management 2022 survey, Citi is the best private bank and wealth manager for high net worth clients (>US$5m - US$30m) in Paraguay.
tag-4: "In collaboration with our Global Wealth Management team, Citi is building the industry's leading wealth management platform to capitalize on the extraordinary wealth creation we are seeing around the world," remarked Antonieta Perez, Chief Country Officer of Citi Paraguay.
tag-5: The results of the Euromoney survey of 2,000 global wealth management experts represent a qualitative ranking of private banking providers by region and area of service.
tag-6: Citi's high net worth services in Latin America are led by Private Banking Head Fernando López Muñoz, whose team of more than 400 professionals is divided among four main hubs in Mexico, Brazil, Northern Latin America and South America.
tag-7: Citi's private banking operation is committed to helping the world's wealthiest individuals, families and legal firms protect and grow their assets responsibly.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
